mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue( id, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address ) values ( #{id}, #{fullname}, #{appellation}, #{owner}, #{company}, #{job}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{website}, #{mphone}, #{state}, #{source}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{address} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_clue a join tbl_user b on a.owner = b.id
a.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and a.company like '%' #{company} '%'
and a.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
and a.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and b.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and a.mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
and a.state like '%' #{state} '%'

select a.id, a.fullname, a.company, a.phone, a.source, b.name as owner, a.mphone, a.state from tbl_clue a join tbl_user b on a.owner = b.id
a.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and a.company like '%' #{company} '%'
and a.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
and a.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and b.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and a.mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
and a.state like '%' #{state} '%'
order by a.createTime desc limit #{count},#{pageSize}

select a.id, a.fullname, a.appellation, b.name as owner, a.company, a.job, a.email, a.phone, a.website, a.mphone, a.state, a.source, a.createBy, a.createTime, a.editBy, a.editTime, a.description, a.contactSummary, a.nextContactTime, a.address
from tbl_clue a join tbl_user b on a.owner = b.id where a.id = #{id}

select c.id as id , b.name, b.startDate, b.endDate, a.name as owner
from tbl_user a join tbl_activity b on a.id = b.owner join tbl_clue_activity_relation c on b.id = c.activityId where c.clueId = #{id}
